mapper.sql: c.userid,u.username,u.user_icon,c.title title,c.topic_id id,c.create_time,'T' type,c.summary,c.gid,(select count(1) from ulewo_topic_comment t where t.topic_id=c.topic_id) comments,c.topic_image_small images

c.userid,u.username,u.user_icon,c.title title,c.blog_id id,c.create_time,'B' type,c.summary,'' gid,(select count(1) from ulewo_blog_comment t where t.blog_id=c.blog_id) comments,c.blog_image_small images

c.userid,u.username,u.user_icon,'' title,c.blast_id id,c.create_time,'L' type,c.content summary,'' gid,(select count(1) from ulewo_blast_comment t where t.blast_id=c.blast_id) comments,c.image_url images
c.group_userid userid,u.user_icon,u.username,c.group_name title,c.gid id,c.create_time,'W' type,c.group_desc summary,c.gid,0,'' images
mapper.select: select sum(allCount) from (select count(c.topic_id) allCount from ulewo_topic c inner join ulewo_user_friend f on c.userid = f.friend_userid inner join ulewo_user u on u.userid = f.friend_userid where f.userid = #{param.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION select count(c.blog_id) allCount from ulewo_blog c inner join ulewo_user_friend f on c.userid = f.friend_userid inner join ulewo_user u on u.userid = f.friend_userid where f.userid = #{param.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION select count(c.blast_id) allCount from ulewo_blast c inner join ulewo_user_friend f on c.userid = f.friend_userid inner join ulewo_user u on u.userid = f.friend_userid where f.userid = #{param.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION select count(c.gid) allCount from ulewo_group c inner join ulewo_user_friend f on c.group_userid = f.friend_userid inner join ulewo_user u on u.userid = f.friend_userid where f.userid = #{param.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) t

select sum(t.allCount) from (select count(1) allCount from ulewo_topic c inner join ulewo_user u on u.userid = c.userid where u.userid=#{param.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION select count(1) allCount from ulewo_blog c inner join ulewo_user u on u.userid = c.userid where u.userid=#{param.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION select count(1) allCount from ulewo_blast c inner join ulewo_user u on u.userid = c.userid where u.userid=#{param.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION select count(1) allCount from ulewo_group c inner join ulewo_user u on u.userid = c.group_userid where u.userid=#{param.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) t
